General.Name: HUA YU LIEN Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Hua Yu Lien Development Co., Ltd. develops, leases, and sells residential and buildings in Taiwan. It is also involved in the leisure activities and restaurant businesses. The company was formerly known as Fui Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hua Yu Lien Development Co., Ltd. in June 2013. Hua Yu Lien Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
